about_the_game:
Ninja Noboken DEMO is an action-focused adventure that takes heavy inspiration from the 80s, 8 bits Games.

The Demo has 2 playable Levels and 1 Boss Level.

There are ninja skills around the way, you will get drops for these different spells. Additionally, you will be always running against time making this rush feeling always present during the entire adventure.

Classic cut scenes will reward you every time that you advance to the next stage.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
